node.excerpt: What exactly is Programming Paradigm? A programming paradigm is a style or way of programming which defines how we think and approach the problems. There can be more than one type programming paradigms. Here is a brief list of the common ones: Imperative Programming Functional Programming Object…

frontmatter.title: A brief introduction to different Programming Paradigms
